description: Manifest of test fixtures with SHA256 checksums for integrity verification

academic-paper.pdf.description: Academic paper with complex formatting, tables, and references

basic.pdf.description: Simple PDF with basic text and headings

comprehensive-manual.pdf.description: Comprehensive manual with TOC, images, and complex structure

data-manual.pdf.description: Data-heavy manual with tables and charts

illustrated-guide.pdf.description: Guide with many illustrations and images

single-page.pdf.description: Single page PDF for simple testing

note: SHA256 hashes will be automatically updated by the fixture utilities when files are verified
